price: Oni u njega neće vjerovati, a zna se šta je bilo s narodima davnašnjim.
arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَقَدۡ خَلَتۡ سُنَّةُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā yu'minūna bihi waqad khalat sunnatu al-awalīna
